Program Description: Save up to 75% on attic insulation professionally installed, up to $600
Equipment Standards Restrictions: Based on improvement of existing insulation's R-value; existing insulation with either an effective R-value less than R-19 or greater than R-19 with proof of underperformance that is improved to R-38 is eligible
Other Restrictions: Must be a current SRP residential electric customer who lives in a single-family detached or attached home or an apartment or condo; new construction and mobile homes are not eligible
